trans-unit.source: Represents the typed value of a validated XML element or attribute.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> class cannot be inherited.
Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
Gets a value indicating whether the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node or an atomic value.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.IsNode%2A> property always returns `false`.
`true` if the validated XML element or attribute is an XPath node; `false` if the validated XML element or attribute is an atomic value.
Gets the `string` value of the validated XML element or attribute.
The `string` value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Gets the current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate Microsoft .NET Framework type according to its schema type.

If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.TypedValue%2A> property is equivalent to the value of the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Value%2A> property.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The current validated XML element or attribute as a boxed object of the most appropriate .NET Framework type.
Gets the `string` value of the validated XML element or attribute.
The `string` value of the validated XML element or attribute.
Returns the validated XML element or attribute's value as the type specified using the <xref href="System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver"></xref> object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAs%2A> method attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework type specified.
The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver> object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions.
For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The type to return the validated XML element or attribute's value as.
The <xref href="System.Xml.IXmlNamespaceResolver"></xref> object used to resolve namespace prefixes.
The value of the validated XML element or attribute as the type requested.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the target type.
The attempted cast is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAsBoolean%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Boolean> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> type.
The attempted cast to <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> is not valid.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAsDateTime%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.DateTime> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> type.
The attempted cast to <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> is not valid.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.Double"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAsDouble%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Double> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as a <xref href="System.Double"></xref>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref href="System.Double"></xref> type.
The attempted cast to <xref href="System.Double"></xref> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAsInt%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int32> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref href="System.Int32"></xref>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> type.
The attempted cast to <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref href="System.Int64"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueAsLong%2A> property attempts to convert the value of the validated XML element or attribute to the Microsoft .NET Framework <xref:System.Int64> type according to the XPath 2.0 rules for casting the item's type.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The validated XML element or attribute's value as an <xref href="System.Int64"></xref>.
The validated XML element or attribute's value is not in the correct format for the <xref href="System.Int64"></xref> type.
The attempted cast to <xref href="System.Int64"></xref> is not valid.
The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.
Gets the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueType%2A> property gets the .NET Framework type of the typed value of the validated XML element or attribute.
For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueType%2A> of <xref:System.Int32> by default.
However, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.ValueType%2A> could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as <xref:System.Int16> or <xref:System.Double>.

For more information about type support in the <xref:System.Xml?displayProperty=fullName> namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).
The .NET Framework type of the validated XML element or attribute.
The default value is <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.XmlType%2A> property gets the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType> for the validated XML element or attribute.
For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType> or <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexType>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> for the validated XML element or attribute.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue.Clone"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ICloneable> interface.
Returns a copy of this <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlAtomicValue"></xref> object.
